summary: Experienced international trade analyst that worked directly with companies in Sweden, Scotland, Argentina, Brazil and Italy, now working on The Netherlands. At Pernod Ricard Brazil I could have Admin and Logistic experiences as well as Quality and International Commerce. Here I could hire 3 delightful people to work with me and implement the SAPI system together with Sao Paulo's team, we enhanced the distribution in Brazil and increased the department in Suape. At Costa Crociere (Italy) I could have more culture and language experiences, starting at the reception in a few months I was at the office of the cruise. Here I could organise better the files and timings for the Director. Now, working as International Sales Specialist I'm internationalising the whole company, which shows me my capacity to grow and work in a good pressure for introducing new products (Electromedical Devices for Communication) in new markets (after my arrival at Norway, Germany, Spain, Switzerland, India and Hungary). Also, in the meanwhile I'm investing my time helping people who want to come to Europe through my Youtube Channel and Instagram, giving them tips and showing them the World that sometimes they cannot see.

education.degree_name: Bachelor degree in ADM with Foreign Trade

profile_positions.description:
Launching the company products in the European and Worldwide markets working directly with Marketing, Business, Production, Development and Supply Chain departments. Since Feb 2021 when I started we reached 24 countries by doing ONLINE conferences and spending NO BUDGET.
Some responsabilities:
• Responsible for the globalization of the products of Dialog Ausili
• Implemented the Follow Up in Excel.
• Negotiations
• International figure for public relations.
• Making conferences and calls with suppliers and new clients
• Responsible for translations
• International Market researching
• International Digital Marketing
profile_positions.title: International Trade Specialist

profile_positions.description:
My mind never stops and I could not be far away from this new way to communicate! By being a youtuber I could have more communication skills, marketing skills and being connected with new ways of expression. Youtube as Instagram is an important and very useful marketing tool, in my case I only use it for personal purposes but it can also help companies.

Selling travel itineraries.

profile_positions.title: Youtuber

profile_positions.description:
Working on board improved my language skills. Also being in a very different environment and multicultural place boosted my ability on team duties. There are more than 100 cultures inside a crew list in the ship and there is no place more diverse than this one.
Some of these duties:
Accounting of cruises, all financial services and assistance to the Administration.
Back Office of the cruises.
Contact with accountance offshore.
Management of problems related to payment in cash, checks or credit card; assistance to guests when they face problems regarding their credit cards and checks; cash deposit collection; currency exchange; management of guests' bills and main courante; responsible for printing guests’ keys; sorting checks from different departments regarding guests’ onboard purchases.
profile_positions.title: Account Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Working at Pernod Ricard was a rich experience that I could not tell all of that here in this little place on Linkedin. Starting as an outside broker working alone at the Suape factory and finishing being hired as the leader of 3 people in the new International Trade Department in loco working under the manager located in Sao Paulo. I was the main contact to The Absolut Company, The Chivas Brothers and Beam Global companies and I was working directly with the Quality, Logistics, Production, Marketing, Selling and Supply Chain teams. Let's say the whole factory was involved as well as the broker. Some of the duties:
• Implementation of SAP for the International TradeI Department (meeting in Argentina)
• Inventory management: maintenance of healthy stocks, optimizations, safety stocks, prevention of back-orders, control of obsolete items, phase-in and phase-outs, etc.
• Distribution of products between different warehouses, according to the sales forecast of each region.
• Creation of import plans: indication of the products to be imported and their quantities, considering container's limits of space and weight. Also, contact to international suppliers to negotiate the delivery details.
• Support the production plans through daily analysis comparing the plans versus sales to identify risks of breakdowns and, if needed, point out priorities.
• Support the plans of national introduction of new foreign products, providing assistance such as setting deadlines and defining the best places to import the goods through.
• Constant contact with the customer service, logistics and foreign trade teams to maintain daily operations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Foreign Trade Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Broker
As an outsourcing only for Pernod Ricard Brasil:
▪	Every day contact with suppliers and foreign clients.
▪	Total monitoring of product deliveries, both in export and import operations.
▪	Monitoring of the customs broker's activities to ensure time and costs.
▪	Analysis and approval of import documents, i.e. Invoice, Packing List, Bill of Lading and certificates.
▪	Generation of export documents: Invoice, Packing List and certificates.
▪	Participation in cost and delivery time reduction projects.
▪	BID of suppliers (bonded warehouses, transporters and shipowners).
▪	Follow-up and KPI checks.
As a corporate broker:
▪	Control of deadlines and costs.
▪	Monitoring of ship arrivals in port.
▪	Approval of import documents.
▪	Contact with public entities for the delivery of documents.
▪	Transfer of containers from the port to the bonded warehouses.
▪	Hiring couriers to deliver products to the final warehouse after customs clearance.
▪	Check invoices and payments to suppliers
profile_positions.title: International Trade Analyst / Broker
